description: The object provides metadata about the API. The metadata can be used by the clients if needed.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: Contact information for the exposed API.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: The email address of the contact person/organization. Constraints: format: email.
The identifying name of the contact person/organization.
The URL pointing to the contact information. Constraints: format: uri.
A longer description of the API. Should be different from the title. CommonMark is allowed.
License information for the exposed API.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

name.description: The name of the license type. It's encouraged to use an OSI compatible license.

anyOf.description: The URL pointing to the license. Constraints: format: uri.
A URL to the Terms of Service for the API. MUST be in the format of a URL. Constraints: format: uri.

title.description: A unique and precise title of the API.

version.description: A semantic version number of the API.
